workshoptitle: Install and Upgrade Autonomous Health Framework to the Latest Version

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Learn how to install and upgrade Oracle Autonomous Health Framework (AHF) on the fly without manually downloading the setup file, ahf_setup.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Install Oracle Autonomous Health Framework (AHF)
tutorials.description: Learn how to install AHF either as root or as a non-root user. You will also learn how to run AHF on SELinux-enabled systems.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Upgrade Oracle Autonomous Health Framework (AHF)
tutorials.description: Learn how to upgrade AHF on the fly without manually downloading ahf_setup.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Apply and rollback AHF updates
tutorials.description: Learn how to apply metadata and framework updates to AHF, roll back to the previous timestamp, and clean up backup files.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
